pageContent: Purpose: To compare hospital readmissions, biochemical recurrence rates, incidence of metastasis, and cancer-specific and overall mortality for prostate cancer patients undergoing radiotherapy vs. radical prostatectomy. The secondary outcome was to identify patient and disease characteristics affecting physician's choice of either therapy.

metaData.source:
High-risk prostate cancer-classification and therapy
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/24840073/
